STARDRAKE OF GRAVITIC COILS: 2 Level 10 monsters\n Once per turn, if your opponent controls a monster with 3000 or more ATK, and it has the highest ATK on the field, you can Xyz Summon "Stardrake of Gravitic Coils" by using 1 monster you control with the lowest ATK or DEF (your choice, if tied) as material. Cannot be used as Xyz or Link Material. While this Xyz Summoned card is on the field, your opponent cannot target monsters for attacks, except this one. If this card battles an opponent's monster, during damage calculation only, this card’s ATK becomes equal to the ATK of the opponent's battling monster +100.
REACTOR SHOCKER: Neither player can activate cards or effects in response to this card's activation. When your opponent activates an effect, and you have an effect in the same Chain: You can negate the activated effects of all cards with a lower Chain Link number than this card then, if the number of your effects in this Chain is equal to or greater than your opponent’s, draw cards equal to that number then if one of your effects in the Chain is Chain Link 1, place 1 card from your hand on the bottom of your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Reactor Shocker" once per turn.
BRUNHILDE, THE IRON BLOOD VANGUARD: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can place 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your hand or Deck in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap, except "Brünhilde, Iron Blood Vanguard", and if you do, this card's Level becomes 8. You can target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone; Special Summon it. During your opponent's turn, if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s), while this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Brünhilde, Iron Blood Vanguard" once per turn.
PRINZ RUPPRECHT, IRON BLOOD LINDWURM: While you control a Level 8 monster or an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap, this card's Level becomes 8. You can only use each of the following effects of "Prinz Rupprecht, Iron Blood Lindwurm" once per turn. You can reveal this card in your hand; Special Summon 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your hand. During your opponent's turn, if your opponent controls a monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, while this card is a Continuous Trap: You can Special Summon this card, then you can, immediately after this effect resolves, Xyz Summon 1 "Iron Blood" Xyz Monster using monsters you control.
REGENSBURG, IRON BLOOD DRAGON: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only use each of the following effects of "Regensburg, Iron Blood Dragon" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck, except "Regensburg, Iron Blood Dragon", also you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of this turn, except Xyz Monsters. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a face-up card(s) you control, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect.
HINDENBURG, IRON BLOOD DOOMBRINGER: If you control an "Iron Blood" card: You can either Special Summon this card from your hand or place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. You can target 1 card your opponent controls; send 1 "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control to the GY, and if you do, destroy that target. When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or effect, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Hindenburg, Iron Blood Doombringer" once per turn.
AGIR, IRON BLOOD UNDERTAKER: You can send 1 other card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; place this card from your hand in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap, then add 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Agir, Iron Blood Undertaker". You can target 1 other monster you control with a Level; its Level becomes 8. When your opponent activates a monster effect, while this card is a Continuous Trap and you control a Rank 8 monster: You can negate that effect. You can only use each effect of "Agir, Iron Blood Undertaker" once per turn.
IRON BLOOD BLITZKRIEG: Each time you activate the effect of an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control or if a card your opponent controls is destroyed by the effect of an "Iron Blood" card you control, inflict 300 damage to your opponent immediately after it resolves. You can send 1 other card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; take 1 "Iron Blood" monster from your Deck and either add it to your hand or place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap. You can only use this effect of "Iron Blood Blitzkrieg" once per turn.
IRON BLOOD RESPITE: You can target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone or GY; add it to your hand. If an "Iron Blood" monster is sent to the GY or is banished by an opponent’s card: You can target 1 "Iron Blood" monster in your GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Iron Blood Respite" once per turn.
BISMARCK, IRON BLOOD COMMANDER: 2 Level 8 monsters\nFor this card's Xyz Summon, you can treat "Iron Blood" Continuous Traps you control as Level 8 monsters for material. You can only use each of the following effects of "Bismarck, Iron Blood Commander" once per turn. During your Main Phase: You can detach any number of materials from this card, and if you do, add "Iron Blood" cards with different names from your Deck to your hand, up to the number of materials detached. If an "Iron Blood" Monster Card(s) you control leaves the field by an opponent’s card, while this card is in your GY: You can banish this card, then target 1 "Iron Blood" Monster Card in your Spell & Trap Zone or GY; Special Summon it.
ULRICH VON HUTTEN, IRON BLOOD DAEMON: ULRICH VON HUTTEN, IRON BLOOD DAEMON

2 Level 8 monsters\nFor each "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control, monsters you control gain 100 ATK and monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ulrich von Hutten, Iron Blood Daemon" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls until the end of this turn. You can target 1 non-Xyz "Iron Blood" monster in your GY or banishment; detach 1 material from this card, and if you do, either Special Summon it or place it in your Spell & Trap Zone as a face-up Continuous Trap.
FRITZ RUMEY, IRON BLOOD JUGGERNAUT: 3+ Level 8 "Iron Blood" monsters\nYou can only control 1 "Fritz Rumey, Iron Blood Juggernaut". Face-up Spell/Traps you control cannot be destroyed by your opponent’s card effects. If the effect of an "Iron Blood" Continuous Trap you control is activated: You can target 1 other card card on the field; destroy it. Once per turn, during your Main Phase or your opponent's Standby Phase: You can detach any number of materials from this card, and if you do, place "Iron Blood" monsters with different names from your hand, Deck, or GY in your Spell & Trap Zones as face-up Continuous Traps, up to the number of materials detached.
THE CONDESCENDER: (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the GY then target 1 face-up monster on the field; declare a number from 1 to 3 then reduce that monster's Level, Rank, or Link Rating by the declared number until the end of the next turn. If a monster whose Level, Rank, or Link Rating is lower than its original value is on the field: You can Special Summon this card from your GY but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use 1 effect of "The Condescender" per turn and only once that turn.
STAINED BIRD BRIA: If this card is in your hand: You can discard 1 card; shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand, then, if your opponent controls more cards than you, draw 1 card. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card in either GY or banishment; place it on the bottom of the Deck, or if it is a "Stain" card, add it to the hand instead, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Bird Bria" once per turn.
STAINED DEER DANTE: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. If this card is in your GY: You can show 1 "Stain" card from your field or face-up in your opponent's Deck, and if you do, shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Deer Dante" once per turn.
STAINED FOX FENESS: If your opponent controls more cards than you: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 other face-up card on the field; negate its effects until the end of this turn, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. You can send 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck to the GY; Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Fox Feness" once per turn.
STAINED RAPTOR ROLLO: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 "Stain" monster in your GY or 1 monster in your opponent's GY; Special Summon it to your field, and if you do, shuffle this card into the Deck. When an attack is declared involving this card and an opponent's monster: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also after that, place that opponent's monster on top of the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stained Raptor Rollo" once per turn.
STAINED SOLITAIRE: You can reveal 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster in your Extra Deck; shuffle 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon this card from your hand. During your Main Phase: You can shuffle 1 "Stain" monster you control that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck, GY, or banishment to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Solitaire" once per turn.
STARGAZER OF THE STAINED: If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Tribute this card from your hand or field; add 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to your hand. If your opponent controls a card: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Stain" monster that mentions "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" from face-up in your opponent's Deck. You can only use each effect of "Stargazer of the Stained" once per turn.
STAINED SCIONESS SILIA: During your Main Phase, if this card is in your hand (Quick Effect): You can Fusion Summon 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using "Stain" monsters that mention "Shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck" from your hand or field as material. If this card is sent to the GY: You can discard 1 card and send 1 "Stain" card from your Deck to the GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Stained Scioness Silia" once per turn.
STAINED SILHOUETTE:
If a card(s) leaves your opponent's Deck, except during the Draw Phase: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, but shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck when it leaves the field. If your opponent controls a card (Quick Effect): You can reveal 1 "Stain" card in your hand, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your Deck or GY.
● Until the End Phase, this card's name becomes the original name of 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and it gains that monster's original effects.
You can only use each effect of "Stained Silhouette" once per turn.
STAINED SOVEREIGN SILAS: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add to your hand or Set 1 "Stain" card from your Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; while it is face-up on the field, neither player can activate its effects. If your opponent activates a card or effect, and this card is in your GY: You can shuffle this card face-up into your opponent's Deck, also, Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your GY. You can only use each effect of "Stained Sovereign Silas" once per turn.
SHATTERING SUSTAINED: Tribute 1 "Stain" monster from your hand, face-up field, or face-up in your opponent's Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Stain" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, but shuffle it face-up into your opponent's Deck when it leaves the field, then you can Tribute 1 "Stain" monster from face-up into your opponent's Deck. During your End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can banish 1 "Stain" monster from your GY; Set this card. You can only use each effect of "Shattering Sustained" once per turn.
ABSTAIN FROM LIGHT: Fusion Summon 1 "Stain" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck using "Stain" monsters from your hand or field as material, also, for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot activate "Abstain from Light", or Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "Stain" monsters. If a "Stain" monster was shuffled into either Deck this turn, you can also banish "Stain" monsters from face-up in your opponent's Deck as material, but return them to the GY during the End Phase.
STAINED AVATAR: 2 "Stain" monsters with different Attributes\nIf a card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish 1 "Stain" monster from face-up in your opponent's Deck instead. If this card is Fusion Summoned by the effect of "Abstain from Light": You can destroy 1 other card on the field. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Stain" Spell/Trap in your GY; apply that card's activation effect. You can only use each effect of "Stained Avatar" once per turn.
STAINED SORCERER SILPHIA:
2 "Stain" monsters with different names
"Stain" monsters you control gain 600 ATK during your turn only. You can only control 1 "Stained Sorcerer Silphia". If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate this effect; shuffle 1 "Stain" monster from your Deck face-up into your opponent's Deck during the Standby Phase of the next turn. Once per Chain, when your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can activate 1 of these effects.
●This card gains 300 ATK.
●This card loses exactly 2000 ATK, and if it does, banish 1 monster on the field and 1 "Stain" monster you control until the End Phase.
DISTAINED DRUID DRAGAR: 1 "Stain" monster + 1 non-LIGHT "Stain" monster\nIf this card is Special Summoned, or if a non-LIGHT "Stain" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: You can Tribute 1 monster from your field or face-up in your opponent's Deck, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; gain LP equal to that monster's ATK, also, change all other face-up monsters they control to face-down Defense Position. You can only use this effect of "Distained Druid Dragar" once per turn.
STAINLESS KALEIDRAGON: "Stargazer of the Stained" + 2 "Stain" monsters\nWhen a monster(s) would be Special Summoned, or a card or effect is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monster(s) (Quick Effect): You can negate that Summon or effect, and if you do, destroy that card(s). You cannot activate cards or effects the turn you activate this effect, except "Stain" cards or effects. If this card is Special Summoned, or if another "Stain" monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field: You can look at your opponent's hand and all face-down cards they control. You can only use each effect of "Stainless Kaleidragon" once per turn.
SOLEMN REBIRTH: You can banish this card from your field or GY; Set all Spell/Trap Cards destroyed by your opponent's card effects this turn from your GY to your Spell & Trap Zone.
TALISMANDRAKE SPARK:
Pendulum Effect:
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. If you Fusion Summon a Pyro Fusion Monster: You can inflict 500 damage to your opponent. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Spark" once per turn.

Monster Effect:
If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck to your hand, except "Talismandrake Spark". If a DARK Pyro Fusion monster is Fusion Summoned to your field: You can place this card from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Spark" once per turn.
TALISMANDRAKE EMBERS:
Pendulum Effect:
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. You can target 1 "Talismandrake" Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but return it to the Extra Deck when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Embers" once per turn.

Monster Effect:
If this card is Summoned while you control another "Talismandrake" monster, except "Talismandrake Embers": You can draw 1 card. If a DARK Pyro Fusion monster is Fusion Summoned to your field: You can place this face-up card from your Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Embers" once per turn.
TALISMANDRAKE HEAT:
You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except Pyro Monsters. You can target 1 DARK Pyro Fusion Monster in your GY; return it to the Extra Deck, and if you do, add this card to your hand. You can only use this effect of “Talismandrake Heat” once per turn.

Monster Effect:
If you control a DARK Pyro monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. During the Main Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Talismandrake" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from your hand or field as material. You can only use each of the previous effects of "Talismandrake Heat" once per turn. Gains 200 ATK for each “Talismandrake” Spell/Trap you control that is equipped to a monster.
TALISMANDRAKE SEAR:
During your Main Phase, or if your opponent activates a card or effect: You can Fusion Summon 1 "Talismandrake" Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, using monsters from you control or in your Pendulum Zone as material. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Sear" once per turn.

Monster Effect:
If this card is used as material for the Fusion or Link Summon of a "Talismandrake" monster: You can Special Summon 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Pendulum Zone, also you can place 1 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monster from your face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use this effect of "Talismandrake Sear" once per turn.
LEFT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SUPPRESS: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up card on the field; destroy it. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro Monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effect.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK, also your opponent cannot target it with card effects.\nYou can only use 1 "Left Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Suppressor" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
RIGHT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SABRE: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro Monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effects.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK for each Equip Spell equipped to a monster you control, also if it would be destroyed by battle, you can destroy this card instead.\nYou can only use 1 "Right Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Sabre" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
RIGHT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE HALBERD: If you control a "Talismandrake" monster: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn. During your Main Phase, or if your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can target 1 DARK Pyro Monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effects.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 ATK for each Equip Spell equipped to a monster you control, also if it would be destroyed by battle, you can destroy this card instead.\nYou can only use 1 "Right Talismandrake Arms - Blaze Halberd" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
TALISMANDRAKE ARMS UNITED: Discard 1 card; place up to 2 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monsters from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zones. If a Pyro Fusion Monster(s) is Special Summoned to your field (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 of those monsters; equip 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck to it as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Arms United" once per turn.
LEFT TALISMANDRAKE ARMS - BLAZE SHIELD: Special Summon 1 "Talismandrake" monster from your Deck, GY, or face-up Extra Deck to your Main Monster Zone. During either player's turn: You can target 1 DARK Pyro Fusion Monster you control; equip this card from your GY to it as an Equip Spell with the following effect.\n● The equipped monster gains 500 DEF for each Equip Spell equipped to a monster you control, also if it would leave the field by your opponent's card effect, you can destroy this card instead.\nYou can only use 1 "Left Talismandrake Arms, Blaze Shield" per turn, and only once that turn.
TALISMANDRAKE PYRE: 1 DARK Pyro monster + 1 Pyro monster\nIf this card is Fusion Summoned: You can activate this effect; from your Deck, either add 1 “Talismandrake” card or 1 DARK Pyro monster to your hand, or send 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap to your GY. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Talismandrake" card in your Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, place 1 "Talismandrake" Pendulum Monster with a different name from your hand, Deck, or face-up Extra Deck in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Pyre" once per turn.
TALISMANDRAKE ENKINDLE: 2 "Talismandrake" monsters\nIf this card is Fusion Summoned: You can take 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY, and either add it to your hand or equip it to a DARK Pyro monster you control as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. When your opponent activates a card or effect while you control a monster equipped with a "Talismandrake Arms" card (Quick Effect): You can banish it. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Enkindle" once per turn.
TALISMANDRAKE CREMATION: 2 "Talismandrake" monsters\nIf this card is Fusion Summoned: You can take 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY, and either add it to your hand or equip it to a DARK Pyro monster you control as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. If you control a monster equipped with a "Talismandrake Arms" card (Quick Effect): You can shuffle up to 3 cards from either player's GY or banishment into the Deck. You can only use each effect of "Talismandrake Cremation" once per turn.
MAIDEN OF TALISMANDRAKES, SERAPHINA:
Pendulum Effect:
You can shuffle 3 "Talismandrake" monsters with different names from your face-up Extra Deck, field, and/or GY into the Deck; Special Summon this card from your Pendulum Zone, then you can equip 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap from your GY to this card as if it was equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect.

Monster Effect:
2 "Talismandrake" monsters + 1 Pyro Pendulum Monster
If this card is Fusion Summoned, or if your opponent activates a card or effect: You can target 1 "Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap in your GY; add it to your hand or equip it to this card as if it were equipped by that Spell/Trap's effect. If a "Right Talismandrake Arms" and "Left Talismandrake Arms" Spell/Trap is equipped to this card (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP; destroy all cards your opponent controls, also you cannot use this effect of "Maiden of Talismandrakes" until the end of next turn. If this card in the Monster Zone leaves the field: You can place it in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of “Maiden of Talismadrakes, Seraphina” once per turn.
